WorkItem.Description:
Don't know if this is related to your filtering error or not... it happened even when starting from a blank form, attempting to switch to gem charts.
 
See the end of this message for details on invoking 
just-in-time (JIT) debugging instead of this dialog box.

WorkItem.Summary: [Base] Crashes when switching to gem charts

Comments.Message: I should add that I'm seeing this error both with downloaded 2.2.19.zip and with self-compiled #36968 using my own filters/itemcache.
I do not believe it is the filters, but I am looking into it. I will also check it back to 2.2.17 where everything was working before.
It could be in the new code for gem colors???
I'm getting this crash as well in 2.2.19.
I'm also guessing that it's the code for the new gem colours, whomever wrote that could you check the case when just selecting "Slot: Gems" without choosing from the submenu?
